channel.title: success on The Chief's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in success on The Chief's Blog

item.title: Joe Moglia
item.description: Disclaimer: I am a shareholder of $OPFI. That’s how I first heard of coach Joe Moglia. These are my notes from this episode of the Co/Investor Club podcast featuring Joe Moglia. About Joe Moglia Joe is the former CEO and Chairman of TD Ameritrade, former head football coach of Coastal Carolina University, chairman of Fundamental Global Investors and Capital Wealth Advisors, chairman of FGNA (now $OPFI), Executive Advisor to the President of Coastal Carolina University.

item.title: Glenn Stearns
item.description: This is a summary of a truly fantastic episode of the “Grit Happens” podcast, featuring Glenn Stearns, founder and CEO of Kind Lending. This episode was shared to me by Sean Iddings as it pertains to $EXPI and SUCCESS Lending, a joint venture between eXp World Holdings and Kind Lending. In other words, this is the baby of not one but two intelligent fanatics. Below are my takeaways from that episode, as I find it easier to retain inforrmation when I read/write it than when I hear it.
